title: Sahid Zarafshon
description: Sahid Zarafshon is a 4-star hotel located in central Bukhara. The hotel offers comfortable rooms, indoor and outdoor pools, a gym, a restaurant, and 24/7 reception. Its central location makes it easy for tourists to explore the city.

title: Mövenpick Hotels & Resorts
description: Mövenpick Hotels & Resorts is a Swiss-heritage hospitality brand known for upscale accommodation and strong culinary traditions. The brand began in 1948 in Zurich with an innovative dining concept inspired by a seagull picking food mid-flight. Mövenpick expanded into hotels in 1973 and today operates more than 80 hotels, resorts, and Nile cruisers in over 35 countries.

title: Farovon Khiva Hotel
description: Farovon Khiva Hotel is located in the heart of Khiva, one of the oldest cities in Uzbekistan and Central Asia. The hotel is suitable for both leisure and business stays, offering 106 modern rooms with national design elements. It features 3 restaurants, a bar, spacious ballrooms, multiple meeting rooms, and a large indoor swimming pool.
facilities: 2 large banquet halls (390 sq.m and 479 sq.m)
